Package de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.controllers

Class CommentController

java.lang.Object
de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.controllers.CommentController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/rest/comments")
public class CommentController
extends java.lang.Object

This Controller provides basic REST Interfaces to interact with Comment entities from the database

Author:
Christoph Frischmuth, John Klippstein, Mickey Knop, Robin Beck

    • CommentController

      @Autowired public CommentController​(CommentRepository commentRepository, PageableService pageableService, CommentService commentService)

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      @GetMapping("/all") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<CommentDto>> getAll​(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="50") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="createdAt") java.lang.String orderBy, @RequestParam(defaultValue="desc") java.lang.String order)
      This Method returns all comments from the database
      Parameters:
      page - the current page (optional)
      size - the number of items per page
      orderBy - the attributed that should be ordered
      order - the order (asc, desc)
      Returns:
      a list of comment dtos

    • getAllByMediumId

      @GetMapping("/all/medium/{mediumId}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<CommentDto>> getAllByMediumId​(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="50") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="createdAt") java.lang.String orderBy, @RequestParam(defaultValue="desc") java.lang.String order, @PathVariable java.lang.Long mediumId)
      This Method returns all comments for a specific medium from the database
      Parameters:
      page - the current page (optional)
      size - the number of items per page
      orderBy - the attributed that should be ordered
      order - the order (asc, desc)
      mediumId - the id of the medium for which comments should be searched
      Returns:
      a list of comment dtos

    • getAllByUserId

      @GetMapping("/all/user/{userId}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<CommentDto>> getAllByUserId​(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="50") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="createdAt") java.lang.String orderBy, @RequestParam(defaultValue="desc") java.lang.String order, @PathVariable java.lang.Long userId)
      This Method returns all comments for a specific user from the database
      Parameters:
      page - the current page (optional)
      size - the number of items per page
      orderBy - the attributed that should be ordered
      order - the order (asc, desc)
      userId - the id of the user for which comments should be searched
      Returns:
      a list of comment dtos

    • getAllByParentCommentId

      @GetMapping("/all/subcomments/{parentId}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<CommentDto>> getAllByParentCommentId​(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="50") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="createdAt") java.lang.String orderBy, @RequestParam(defaultValue="asc") java.lang.String order, @PathVariable java.lang.Long parentId)
      This Method returns all answers to a certain comment from the database
      Parameters:
      page - the current page (optional)
      size - the number of items per page
      orderBy - the attributed that should be ordered
      order - the order (asc, desc)
      parentId - the id of the comment for which comments(answers) should be searched
      Returns:
      a list of comment dtos

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CommentDto> getById​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id) throws CommentNotFoundException
      This method is used to get a specific comment from the database
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the comment that should be searched
      Returns:
      a CommentDto of the found comment
      Throws:
      CommentNotFoundException - if there is no comment that matches the id

    • add

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'User\')") @PostMapping(path="/add", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CommentDto> add​(@RequestBody Comment comment) throws InvalidCommentException
      This method is used to add a new comment to the database
      Parameters:
      comment - the comment that should be added to the database
      Returns:
      a dto of the newly added comment
      Throws:
      InvalidCommentException - if the comment contains invalid values

    • update

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'User\')") @PutMapping(consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CommentDto> update​(@RequestBody Comment comment) throws CommentNotFoundException
      This method is used to update an existing comment from the database
      Parameters:
      comment - the comment that should be updated
      Returns:
      a dto of the updated comment
      Throws:
      CommentNotFoundException - if the comment contains invalid values

    • deleteComment

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'User\')") @DeleteMapping("/{id}") org.springframework.http.HttpStatus deleteComment​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id)
      This method is used to delete a comment and all of its subcomments (answers) from the database
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the comment that should be deleted
      Returns:
      http status 200

    • countComments

      @GetMapping("/count/{mediumId}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Long> countComments​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long mediumId)
      This method is used to count how many comments are saved for a specific medium
      Parameters:
      mediumId - the medium id that should be searched
      Returns:
      the number of comments for the given medium id
